body:
Veeam's Global Campaigns and Digital Marketing team is now hiring. We are utilizing innovative digital and offline marketing techniques for engagement creation, contextual marketing and lifecycle marketing to connect with our audience in 70+ countries.

Google, Baidu and Social Media Advertisement Specialist will join the PPC team, which generates demand and awareness for Veeam products across the globe.

Responsibilities

Creation of high performance Google, Baidu and social media advertisement campaigns (demand generation, nurturing)
Maintenance and optimization of existing campaigns
Development of ad assets (landing pages, banners and ad copies) in collaboration with in-house creative and localization team.
A/B and multivariate testing of ad copies and landing pages
Budget planning and optimization
Constant reporting on campaign performance and results

Qualifications

Understanding of SEM, SEO, Analytics and overall Digital Marketing best practices including methods and metrics for analysis
Direct PPC experience with Google AdWords, Bing and retargeting is a must (you need to be certified for Google AdWords and Google Analytics at least)
Experience with basic HTML, JavaScript, and CSS is a plus
Fluent English
Analytical skills, data-driven mindset and strong attention to details
Self-starter with good organizational and time-management skills; able to multi-task and prioritize as well as strong follow-through
Strong interpersonal, writing, and verbal skills are required
Ability to learn quickly

Additional skills

Additional language is a strong plus (Mandarin)
Asia advertisement experience a plus but not a must

We offer

Employment in a growing dynamic company
Modern energetic multicultural environment
Interesting people, an excellent team of professionals
Extensive opportunities for professional growth and career
Flexible work schedule
An extended medical insurance policy
Partial compensation of costs on fitness
title: GOOGLE,  BAIDU AND SOCIAL MEDIA ADVERTISEMENT SPECI
